snippet.title: Wizardry Empire: The Staff of Resurrection (Fukkatsu no Tsue) - Test Gameplay
snippet.description:
Finally, the final version of the translation patch for Wizardry Empire: The Staff of Resurrection, this game is not to be confused with Wizardry Empire II: Legacy of the Princess for PlayStation and PC, however both of them are completely different story, races, classes, etc. Gameplay is very similar to Llylgamyn trilogies, the Game Boy Color for both Wizardry Empire 1 & 2 features new Archer class (no relation with Ranger from Dark Savant saga), 5 new prestige classes which is pretty rare. The gameplay is very similar to its predecessor, Wizardry Empire (GBC).

Get the VERY LATEST translation patch here: http://www.romhacking.net/translations/2322/

ADDENDUM patch here: http://www.romhacking.net/translations/2902/

Check out the prequel also: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=az3-41nzOLU&t=54s

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gamerhenky
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Gamerhenky
Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/id/gamerhenky/

Donation/Support
Ko-fi (Worldwide): https://Ko-fi.com/Gamerhenky
Saweria (For Indonesia only): https://saweria.co/Gamerhenky
